body:
As you may know, I use a laptop, which has low FPS and no mouse, just the pad, so I find it very difficult for PvP, which is why my K/D is poor. So I was startled when I managed my first monument about 10 minutes ago - I will never forget it!

Abandoned Park - F-Left. And it was near the end of the match as it was the second to last monument required - both of the backs had already been destroyed so it was harder for me to do the front.

iBiZa

title: Just Had to Mention... :D
